title: gOkulada gOpiyaradEsu
sahitya:
gOkulada gOpiyaradEsu dhanyarO shrIkAntananurAgadali pADutiharo


caraNam 1    kuLitu karevAga nintu kaLavegaLa kuTTuvAga taLisAraNi sammArjisuvAga 
aLuva makkaLa toTTiloLiTTu tUguvAga beLagu jAvadi mosara kaDevAgalu
    caraNam 2    naDevAga nuDivAga bhOjanava mADuvAga uDuvAga AbharaNa iDuvAgalu
muDivAga mallige uyyaleyavADuvAga aDigaDige tAmbUla meluvAgalu
    caraNam 3    pari pari rAgadindali pari pari mAtininda pari pari gIta prasangadinda 
paripUrNa nAda shrI purandara viTTalana haridAgi manadoLage smarisutiharu
